snippet.title: Almari Trailer (Mother Direct 2021)
snippet.description:
ALMARI is a surreal horror/adventure RPG following the titular TV-headed Almari on his quest to collect the emotions he was born without. Explore strange and beautiful monochrome worlds based on emotions and the equally otherworldly monsters that reside within them. Meet and befriend many interesting characters as Almari sets off to find the secrets that lie within the Emotion Worlds.

This trailer was featured in Mother Forever's 2021 Mother Direct. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6ducLZFNl8 

Check out the demo on itch.io and follow the project on twitter! 
https://demonclaus.itch.io/almari
https://twitter.com/almarirpg 

ALMARI TEAM
DemonClaus https://twitter.com/demonclaus 
POST ELVIS https://twitter.com/PostElvis
NoirKonya https://twitter.com/NoirKonya
Punkitt!! https://twitter.com/punkittdev

TRAILER CREDITS
Edited by Thomas Torres (POST ELVIS)  

Featuring the voices of:
Chase Beck https://twitter.com/TheChaseBeck
Anita Sleap https://twitter.com/AnitaSleapVA
GhostyToast https://twitter.com/reteryisk
Yung Hermes https://twitter.com/yung_hermes 
DemonClaus
POST ELVIS
Punkitt!!

Thumbnail art by Cam Collins https://twitter.com/CAMCOLLINS999
